metadata.title: CVE-2015-7048 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WebKit in Apple iOS before 9.2, Safari before 9.0.2, and tvOS before 9.1allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial ofservice (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted web site, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2015-7095, CVE-2015-7096, CVE-2015-7097,CVE-2015-7098, CVE-2015-7099, CVE-2015-7100, CVE-2015-7101, CVE-2015-7102,and CVE-2015-7103.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
